sentence.text: Consistent with this pattern of activity, transcription by RNA polymerase I and polr1d homozygous mutant zebrafish exhibit cartilage hypoplasia and cranioskeletal anomalies characteristic of humans with Treacher Collins syndrome.

More importantly, we show that genetic inhibition of tp53 can suppress neuroepithelial cell death and ameliorate the skeletal anomalies in transcription by RNA polymerase I and transcription, DNA-templated mutants, providing a potential avenue to prevent the pathogenesis of Treacher Collins syndrome.
